name: ROSEBRAND Organic Tapioca Syrup (GL40A)
description: ROSEBRAND Organic Tapioca Syrup (GL40A) is a premium sweetener that brings a touch of natural sweetness to your culinary creations. This tapioca syrup falls under the Sweeteners & Syrups product category, making it an essential ingredient in various food applications. It caters to markets such as bakery, confectionery, desserts & fruit preparations, beverage (juice & juice drinks), dairy, and food processing & packaging. With its nutritive sweetener function, it enhances the taste profile of your food products. Made from plant-origin ingredients, this organic tapioca syrup maintains its natural authenticity. It comes in a convenient liquid form, packaged in drums, totes (IBC), and tanks for easy availability. Enjoy the benefits of this organic sweetener with its sweet taste and certifications, including being Non-GMO, Halal, Kosher, and GMP compliant.
